getTableInfo.aop_point_method:
import com.stuko.anaconda.business.*;
import com.stuko.saas.trinity.*;
if(((BusinessCollection)result.getReturnObject("checkSaaSDB")).size() == 0) This.doProcessSkip(true);
else{
BusinessData bd = ((BusinessCollection)result.getReturnObject("checkSaaSDB")).getBusinessData(0);
if(!"Y".equals(bd.getFieldValue("UseTrinity"))){
System.out.println(bd.getFieldValue("Url"));
System.out.println(bd.getFieldValue("Id"));
System.out.println(bd.getFieldValue("Password"));
System.out.println(bd.getFieldValue("Driver"));
System.out.println(bd.getFieldValue("MaxConnection"));
request.setFieldValue("url",bd.getFieldValue("Url"));
request.setFieldValue("id",bd.getFieldValue("Id"));
request.setFieldValue("password",bd.getFieldValue("Password"));
request.setFieldValue("driver",bd.getFieldValue("Driver"));
request.setFieldValue("max",bd.getFieldValue("MaxConnection"));
request.setFieldValue("valid_sql","select 1");
}else{
System.out.println("jdbc:mysql://db.bestmember.net:3306/" + bd.getFieldValue("DBName"));
System.out.println(bd.getFieldValue("UserId"));
System.out.println(request.getEncFieldValue("session.Account"));
System.out.println(bd.getFieldValue("Driver"));
System.out.println("5");
request.setFieldValue("url","jdbc:mysql://db.bestmember.net:3306/" + bd.getFieldValue("DBName") + "?autoReconnect=true&useSSL=false");
request.setFieldValue("id",bd.getFieldValue("UserId"));
request.setFieldValue("password",request.getFieldValue("session.Account"));
request.setFieldValue("driver",bd.getFieldValue("Driver"));
request.setFieldValue("max","5");
request.setFieldValue("valid_sql","select 1");
}


}
